summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the north 175 feet of the south 335 feet of that portion of the Southeast one-quarter of the Northeast one-quarter of Section 22, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W. M., lying between 33rd Avenue West and 34th Avenue West, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-102 and 17-73, respectively.
